title: Unable to login to riot support??

replies.body:
In order to login to the support site, you have to be email verified. Check your spam folder to ensure the verification email isn't landing there. 

Let me know if you still aren't getting the verification email.
Finally figured out how to get the verification email. Now for the part of the not being able to log in. Tried uninstalling, patching, switching wifis, hextech tool, nada. :(
Can you let me know exactly what error message you get when you try? Or can you [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the error?

Hey, sorry i never responded. I eventually brute forced my way in by trying to log in multiple times. The error message I got was "did not recieve response from the server Attempt 1....2....3....4... Error"

Its all good, got logged in.

hi can you help me. i go to log in and this is the messeges
This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details.

For your specific issue, you'll want to reach out to our support team via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can provide context as to why you're seeing that.

I attempted to change my email to see if i had entered it wrong, and it says that that is already my email. So, my email is fine, checked junk folder, nothing there. Unable to login to either the game itself or support site.
